AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Our company is committed in providing quality service with efficiency and cost effectiveness. Upon initial request, our staff will contact you to schedule an appointment to discuss your needs. Meeting you and viewing the job is important to us as it allows us to ensure that we give an accurate assessment and reduces the risk of unforeseen problems or misunderstanding which can affect budget. Once an assessment is performed and all your options are discussed, a quote will be provided within 2 to 5 business days (depending on size of a project).

When you choose Sonama Contracing, we work with you to determine timelines. We understand that you're excited about your project’s completion and that any renovation can disrupt your home or work. For this reason, projects are scheduled and completed as efficiently as possible without compromising quality.

We know that you will be satisfied with our work because we understand that without you and word of mouth…we don’t have a business.

profile:
Penguin Basements is your full-service Basement Renovation Company. 

Nothing beats a finished basement as a cost-effective way to add living space or rental income to your home in the Greater Toronto Region. Whether you need design, permits or a stunning build, be sure to call the Renomark certified contractor Penguin for a Free Estimate today.

You'll find hundreds of our satisfied customers all across Southern Ontario in the GTA, the Tri-Cities Area and the Greater Ottawa Area. Our experienced, trained professionals make it easy for Penguin Basements to stand behind every job we do. So, If there's a basement renovation in your future, contact Penguin Basements today, where 100% total satisfaction is guaranteed! Don't get scammed by fly-by-night operators, unrealistically low prices, too short build times or fake reviews. We invite you to visit us in person anytime.

• Basement Renovation Specialist
• Guaranteed Mold-Resistant Materials
• FREE In-Home Design & Estimate
• Easy Financing Available
• No Interest for 12 Months*
• Transferable Limited Lifetime Material Warranty
• 2-Year Comprehensive Warranty
• Exclusive Penguin Benefits

Be sure to check our one of our Basement Showcase Open House weekends where you can inspect our work up close and in person!

profile:
Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. All Euro Choice Windows & Doors products are built to strict specifications and are regularly inspected for operation and craftsmanship. All our staff is professional and courteous with many years of experience. Since we do not use sub-contractors we have a reputation for consistency and quality. This reputation took nearly 20 years to build and we are proud to see our windows and doors in your home. 

Services: Windows Installation & Insulation
Doors Installation & Insulation

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
After working closely with a various of local contractors, we realized why customers are often left disappointed and completely unsatisfied with received services. Lack of customer support, poor product demonstration, inability to take responsibility for projects, as well as hardships upon work delivery made them step up and try to make a change in the industry. That's how the RenoDuck Basements was born.
–––
Through the use of modern technologies, discipline, strict standards and processes, RenoDuck Basements successfully works with tight deadlines, delivers a high-quality product, and matches it up with exceptional service throughout the whole process.
–––
- Upon arrival, we give you a free consultation, a free 3D design on the spot!
- We specialize in Basement Renovation, Bathroom Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Home Improvement, and House Renovation.
- While being a one-stop shop, we employ top-notch professionals who may not only deliver a high-quality work but also are a pleasure to work and communicate with.
- Do not hesitate and reach out to book your FREE Estimate at +1 (647) 245-2405 or at https://www.renoduck.com
–––

With 17 years’ experience working in home renovations in Toronto, GTA, Central East and Central West areas, we are your contractor of choice to complete your project. profile:
DECKS,
We customize decks from start to finish. everything from railings to stairs with superb design. Get the modern look of composite decking or maybe cedar for a sophisticated feel. Anything you picture is always possible. customer satisfaction is what keeps us going!

FENCES,
All fences have the ability to be made with a unique personal touch, the customer can be the designer. Let us know what you want and JWC Construction has the tools to perfect it. They can be used to keep the dog in the yard, block your house from the road, or maybe to add a little privacy to your new deck!

RENOVATIONS,
Have you ever just sat down and wondered what that wall would look a different colour, or maybe how much more you could do in there if it was that much bigger. JWC cares about the love of a home and takes pride in experimenting different ways to make it your own. Anything from granite countertops for a spectacular kitchen to a finished basement to fit the pool table!

DEMO SERVICES, 
Do you have a structure or items that need to be dismantled or demolished and taken away? Are you looking for a demolition company that is fully licensed, experienced and insured? JWC Construction has what you are looking for! We are experienced in all sorts of demolition and our fully equipped friendly crew will demolish and dismantle, then take your junk away! for recycling or disposal. No mess left behind!

JUNK REMOVAL,
JWC Construction is your trust worthy full-service junk removal company. We offer junk removal services for your home and business. We ensure that your junk is recycled, donated and disposed of correctly and in a timely fashion.
Do you have old furniture, appliances, electronics, tires, construction debris, or yard waste you need to rid yourself of? JWC Construction can remove almost any material! while you relax. We’ll remove your junk and vow that no junk will be left behind! 

AGGREGATE DELIVERIES,
Don't have the time or energy to pick it up yourself? No worries! leave to us!! We deliver everything from soil, mulch, and aggregates to decorative stones. Not sure if we deliver what you are looking for? chances are we do and if we haven't we will! We'll deliver to your front door! Our friendly and knowledgeable crew are always ready to help you make your projects a reality!

HANDYMAN SERVICES,

profile:
When it’s designed right, it will serve its purpose and you will feel comfortable in it. If you feel like your bathroom is outdated or you would like to change the colors and style, you should turn to experts like us. We, from Bryte Custom Contracting, are able to help you not only tear down everything in your current bathroom but also design a new layout. We will help you choose a style that will fit your personal preferences and needs. From choosing the right tiles for the floor and walls to the vanity and mirrors, we can help you with everything!

Do you want to have more storage space in the bathroom so you can fit all the towels there as well as toiletries? If this is the case, we can help you find a solution to this issue. We will suggest different cabinets, built-in shelves, and vanity options that will provide you with the storage space you need. Once you decide on a design, we will roll up our sleeves and get cracking. We can paint, install tiles, cabinets, vanities, and plumbing, and lighting fixtures. Basically, we will do everything to make your vision a reality!


So if you live in Barrie or Georgian Bay, ON area and you want to hire a dependable bathroom remodeling service provider, look no further than us. We will be by your side every step of the way and help you get the bathroom you have always wanted. Contact us today if you need more information or would like to schedule a meeting with us!

profile:
Our job at High Class Renovation is to take your vision and make it a reality. We start by listening to your vision about your project and once we have a clear picture we begin to create the design for your renovation. Our goal is to ensure that everything is to your expectations. When it’s time to start your project, we go to work and complete the renovations just as we discussed, on time and within budget.

High Class Renovation is Barrie and surrounding Area’s leading home renovations service. We have 20 years of experience completing home and commercial renovation projects of all sizes. During that time of making our clients’ renovation visions a reality, we have worked in a variety of settings and installed hundreds of thousands of square feet of ceramic, porcelain and marble tile in custom houses, condos and new subdivisions.

profile:
During the past twenty years we are proud to be known as the most dependable, innovative and skilled contractors in the industry. 
We have a wide range of experience and expertise in Residential, Retail and Commercial accounts. 
This comes as a result of the structured focus of our team in building lasting and beneficial relationships with our clients. 
We invite you to browse through our website. Should there be any interest in receiving an estimate, do not hesitate to contact us.

Quality Assurance isn't just our name it's also one of our highest achievable priorities that we stand by. 
Successful control over our contracts has always been an important part of our philosophy. 
Our approach to maintaining high standards of workmanship and to assure customer satisfaction, our customer retention rate is a key factor to our business successes. 
Quality controls are maintained by doing regular quality check points with our clients.

We start with a detailed analysis of each contract, collecting all pertinent data needed for the preparation of a realistic service 
proposal. Our knowledge of the assessed account enables us to prepare both Scheduling and Quality Assurance.

Give A Call - 905-955-5248
products: We use up to date materials with strong substrates for longevity.

profile:
TRIT Homes is a top-tier design and renovation firm that services Toronto and the GTA.

Our team of experienced professionals holds a wide variety of custom concepts and designs that have been perfectly executed to the client’s vision, timeline, and price point. Quality and care are just some of the characteristics that TRIT Homes Remodeling applies to every project. 

Our commitment to excellence is what will separate TRIT Homes from other home remodelers. Please connect with us today to discuss your home improvement design, remodel or rebuild.


We look forward to collaborating with you.
